body_html:
@girving What we have been doing in our CI for this is instead of just building all of TF, we build

bazel build //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/compiler -//tensorflow/contrib/...

As parts of contrib may also have different requirements, like android dependencies for lite, GPU dependency for nccl, etc.
body:
@girving What we have been doing in our CI for this is instead of just building all of TF, we build
```
bazel build //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/compiler -//tensorflow/contrib/...
```
As parts of contrib may also have different requirements, like android dependencies for lite, GPU dependency for nccl, etc.
